title: Crisis-Responsive Science Education: Competency Strengthening Through a Three-Stage Pedagogical Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific literacy and general understanding of societal issues
context.additional_context: General education course in social studies aiming to cultivate citizens with crisis response capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the scientific and social characteristics of at least three types of crisis situations.
Learners can present predictive outcomes using a data-driven crisis impact assessment model.
Learners can develop two crisis management strategies and establish execution plans based on actual case studies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
